Package com.ibm.streams.management.security

Interface RoleMXBean

All Superinterfaces:
PrincipalMXBean
public interface RoleMXBean extends PrincipalMXBean
RoleMXBean provides attributes, operations, and notifications for managing Streams role principals. A role has zero or more users and zero or more groups. Changes to the permissions for a role affect all users and groups with that role.

Notifications:
A RoleMXBean supports sending the following notifications:

Notifications.SECURITY_ROLE_DELETED

Notification categories:
These categories can be used with notification filters to easily filter out all notifications in a category.
Notifications.SECURITY_NOTIFICATION

  • Method Details

    • getGroups

      Set<String> getGroups()
      Returns the names of groups having this role.
      Returns:
      the groups with this role.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • getUsers

      Set<String> getUsers()
      Returns the names of users having this role.
      Returns:
      the users with this role.
      Throws:

      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • addGroup

      void addGroup(String group)
      Assigns this role to a group.
      Parameters:
      group - identifies the group to which the role is assigned.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      NullPointerException - if group is null.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • addUser

      NullPointerException - if user is null.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • removeGroup

      void removeGroup(String group)
      Removes the role for a group.
      Parameters:
      group - identifies the group for which the role is removed.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      NullPointerException - if group is null.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.
